divs: Sighting Detailsmy mom was putting her laundry in the dryer and saw 3 lights and she knew it wasnt orion because they were to low so my dad and i checked it out and saw that they sightly moved. we stared for about an hour and i decided to right this report up cause i knew that wasnt normal. my dad went to the refrigerator garage and it turns out during the time i was filling this out they vanished into the air. they were no longer there and i was left in shock. but then my dad noticed that one was left and was much lower than the last time we saw it. another thing is that my dad saw these a few days ago and said he saw them in the same direction in the horizon but in a triangle. i tryed to take a picture and film but they didnt show up in my camera. i really do hope you investigate because this is the first unusual thing i have ever seen in the san fernando valley. thank you for your time.
Summary: in a line and they slighly move two are bluish and one fire color (yellow-orange)
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around August 14th 2012
